title: noReturnCommisionAdjustment
description: This schema is used to setup a no return commision adjustment for a Jet Product Category

jet_category.description:
The Jet category for which you defining a a no return commission adjustment

			#Valid values

			*Appliances

			*Arts, Crafts & Hobbies

			*Automotive

			*Baby

			*Clothing, Shoes & Accessories

			*Electronics

			*grocery

			*Health & Beauty

			*Home, Garden, Home Improvement

			*Industrial & Scientific

			*Jewelry and Watches

			*Media - Books, CDs, DVDs

			*Office Products

			*Pet Supplies

			*Sporting Goods

			*Toys & Games

fee_adjustment.description:
This is the increase in commision you are willing to pay for products in given jet category if the customer waives their ability to return them.  

			For example, if you want to increase the commission you are willing to pay from a base rate of 15% to 17%, then you should enter '.02'

			#Valid values

			A mumber with up to 1 digit allowed to the left of the deimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point
